name: Incident Response Testing And Exercises
description: The organization tests and/or exercises the incident response capability for the information system [Assignment: organization-defined frequency, at least annually] using [Assignment: organization-defined tests and/or exercises] to determine the incident response effectiveness and documents the results.\n
supplemental_guidance: NIST Special Publication 800-84 provides guidance on test, training, and exercise programs for information technology plans and capabilities.\n
